main event: A government employee reported seeing a round, long, silvery object with flame and smoke trailing for about a mile over Washington D.C.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5-8 seconds,The object turned and disappeared at an altitude of 5,000 ft.,The sighting occurred at dusk,The control tower operator at Washington National Airport reported a vapor trail to the west 15 minutes prior to this sighting,The object was observed visually without any photographs.
